LightningComponentBundle.description: Simple Conditional Layout based on SF PEG Merge expression

property.name: forceDisplay
property.label: Force Complete Display?
property.description: Flag to force the display of all sections (for Builder configuration).

property.name: condition
property.label: Condition
property.description: Condition to evaluate leveraging the SF PEG Context Merge Syntax.

property.name: hasDefault
property.label: Show Default?
property.description: Flag to activate default section when condition not met.

property.name: objectApiName
property.label: Object Name
property.description: API Name of the current record for the SF PEG Merge context

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record ID
property.description: Record ID of the current record for the SF PEG Merge context
